job.title: Remote Unity Software Engineer - Unity/C#, 3D engine, Java
job.description:
If you are a Unity Software Engineer with experience, please read on!
---100% Remote | Full-Time/Permanent---
We are an advanced talent development and workforce analytics software company that gives leaders deep insight to manage talent strategically, unlock human potential, and predict the likelihood of organizational/individual success.
This Software Engineer will assist us with research, design and development of software that is used in simulation environments on multiple devices including laptops, tablets, phones and VR headsets. You will be responsible for building simulations in game-like environments using characters and virtual environments.
What You Will Be Doing
What You Need for this Position
What's In It for You
So, if you are a Unity Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
James.Shramek@CyberCoders.com
James Shramek - Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
